EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Email_CustomerSatisfactionSurvey_Q114.NYC - Nov. 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Satisfaction Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
At Pivotal Labs, your feedback is critical for us in learning how to serve you better. We've designed a short Customer Satisfaction survey to understand what we are doing well, where we can improve, and to give you the opportunity to share your feedback with us.
At this time, we would like to invite you to complete our survey. This survey will only take 5 minutes to complete.
Click HERE <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/7YWYSBH> to complete the survey.
Rest assured that all your responses are anonymous, confidential and will not be made public. This survey will close Friday, November 14, 2014 at noon (local time).
We look forward to serving your team and your product needs better.
Link to survey: https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/7YWYSBH <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/7YWYSBH>
Sincerely, Edward Hieatt COO, Pivotal Labs
